title: Suicide bomb targets foreign forces in Kabul
description:
(24 Sep 2017) Afghanistan's Interior Ministry said on Sunday a suicide car bomber has struck a convoy of international forces in the capital, wounding three civilians.
The ministry's statement did not provide further details on Sunday's attack. 
No one claimed responsibility, but the Taliban and an Islamic State affiliate have repeatedly targeted Afghan and foreign forces in recent years.
